protein.specific_function: Preferential hydrolysis of the beta-Ala-|-His dipeptide (carnosine), and also anserine, Xaa-|-His dipeptides and other dipeptides including homocarnosine

go_class.description: peptidase activity, acting on l-amino acid peptides
